Code: EXEC SQL SELECT t1.NUM_APOLICE, t1.NRENDOS, t1.NRPARCEL, T1.SITUACAO, t1.ocorhist, T2.BCOCOBR, T2.AGECOBR, T2.NRAVISO FROM seguros.v1parcela t1, seguros.v1parcela t2 WHERE t1.num_apolice = t2.num_apolice AND t1.nrendos = t2.nrendos AND t1.nrparcel = t2.nrparcel AND t1.ocorhist = t2.ocorhist AND t1.situacao = '1' AND t2.bcocobr = :BCOCOBR AND t2.agecobr = :AGECOBR AND t2.nraviso = :NRAVISO END SQL
